text: Carl Edward Sanders, Sr. (May 15, 1925 â€“ November 16, 2014) was an American politician. He served as the 74th Governor of the state of Georgia serving from 1963 to 1967. Sanders died on November 16, 2014 at the age of 89, after a fall at his home in Augusta, Georgia, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Governor Sanders' official website Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Governors of Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Augusta, Georgia
title: Carl Sanders
